summary:
•	More than 14 year experience with a solid career developed in Quality assurance and Quality control areas. Experience in implementing a “Quality Management System” in product supply, product manufacturing site, Quality Control lab and other strategic business areas e.g. Medical Department (Quality Support for Regulatory Affairs, Clinical Trials and Pharmacovigilance), Finance (Quality Support for Legal and Logistics) and Marketing departments.
•	Project manager – QC laboratory (construction, qualification, documentation and validation), including CDS (Chromatographic data system) Empower 3 planning and implementation; Analytical method validation (Process and document development); Quality management System implementation; product manufacturing site validation implementation (Process and document development); Cold distribution chain validation; SAP implementation and validation.
•	Head of a Quality Control Department for Healthcare products, including laboratory administration for Drugs, Medical Device and Cosmetics release and method validation. Responsible for budget planning, cost reduction strategy, good laboratory practices and OHS KPIs.
•	Experience as Lead Audit for Quality management system, Manufacturing Site, Pharmacovigilance, Regulatory Affairs and Product Supply (including warehouse and custom clearance).
•	Experience with third party qualification, inspection and manufacturing tech transfer.
•	Qualified Green Belt in 6-Sigma Methodology. Main developing field in quality and product supply projects. Experience with in process control for manufacturing sites; process mapping for B2G and B2B activities; Quality control laboratory release optimization.
